mapper.select: SELECT mo.`id`,mo.`movie_main_title`,mo.`release_time`, mo.`default_img`, CAST(AVG(umc.`score`) AS DECIMAL(2,1))AS score, mr.`id` AS region_id, mr.region_name,mt.`id` AS type_id, mt.`type_name` ,YEAR(mo.`release_time`) AS `year` FROM `movie` AS mo LEFT JOIN user_movie_comment AS umc ON umc.`movie_id` = mo.`id` INNER JOIN movie_region AS mr ON mr.id = mo.movie_region_id INNER JOIN `movie_relation_type` AS mrt ON mrt.movie_id = mo.id INNER JOIN `movie_type` AS mt ON mt.id = mrt.movie_type_id WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,NOW() , mo.release_time) BETWEEN -50 AND 0 AND mo.is_upper_shelf = 1 GROUP BY mo.id,mrt.movie_type_id
